name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: '[FEATURE] '

assignees: ''
---

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Who is affected?
Example: "As a cashier, I cannot see which table has been waiting the longest, so I don't know which to prioritize."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature you'd like. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you consider? Why is your proposal better?

## Who Would Benefit

- [ ] Admin
- [ ] Kitchen staff (KDS)
- [ ] Cashier (POS)
- [ ] Customer
- [ ] Developer / Integrator

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other products, or any other context that helps explain the request.
